SQL: SELECT P112.AREA_NAME,P113.MODEL_NO,P21.EQUIP_NO,P21.EQUIP_DESCR_1,P21.EQUIP_DESCR_2, P21.INSULATION_THK,P23.C_REF_LOC_X,P23.C_REF_LOC_Y,P22.NOZZLE_NO,P22.RATING, P22.NOMINAL_PIPING_DIA,P22.PREPARATION,P22.PIPING_MATER_CLASS,P22.SERVICE,P23.C_ORIENTATION_1, P23.C_FACE_OF_FLANGE_X,P23.C_FACE_OF_FLANGE_Y,P23.C_FACE_OF_FLANGE_Z FROM PD_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_113 P113,PD_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_112 P112,DD_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_21_{TABLENAME} P21, DD_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_22_{TABLENAME} P22,DD_{PROJECTNAME}.PDTABLE_23_{TABLENAME} P23 WHERE P21.EQUIP_INDX_NO=P22.EQUIP_INDX_NO AND P22.EQUIP_INDX_NO=P23.EQUIP_INDX_NO AND P23.NOZZLE_INDX_NO=P22.NOZZLE_INDX_NO AND P113.AREA_INDEX_NO=P112.AREA_INDEX_NO AND P113.PARTITION_NO='{TABLENAME}' AND P113.DISCIPLINE_INDX_NO='2' ORDER BY P112.AREA_NAME,P113.MODEL_NO,P21.EQUIP_NO,P22.NOZZLE_NO
